problem_names:
lemma measure_induct2:
fixes meas :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> nat"
assumes "\<And>x1 x2. (\<And>y1 y2. meas y1 y2 < meas x1 x2 \<Longrightarrow> S y1 y2) \<Longrightarrow> S x1 x2"
shows "S x1 x2"
translations:
lemma measure_induct2:
fixes meas :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> nat"
assumes "\<And>x1 x2. (\<And>y1 y2. meas y1 y2 < meas x1 x2 \<Longrightarrow> S y1 y2) \<Longrightarrow> S x1 x2"
shows "S x1 x2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S x1 x2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S x1 x2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S x1 x2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S x1 x2

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S (fst (x1, x2)) (snd (x1, x2))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<forall>y.
          meas (fst y) (snd y) < meas (fst x) (snd x) \<longrightarrow>
          S (fst y) (snd y) \<Longrightarrow>
       S (fst x) (snd x)

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<And>y1 y2.
      meas y1 y2 < meas ?x1.0 ?x2.0 \<Longrightarrow>
      S y1 y2) \<Longrightarrow>
  S ?x1.0 ?x2.0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<forall>y.
          meas (fst y) (snd y) < meas (fst x) (snd x) \<longrightarrow>
          S (fst y) (snd y) \<Longrightarrow>
       S (fst x) (snd x)

proof (state)
this:
  S (fst (x1, x2)) (snd (x1, x2))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S x1 x2

proof (prove)
using this:
  S (fst (x1, x2)) (snd (x1, x2))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S x1 x2

proof (state)
this:
  S x1 x2

goal:
No subgoals!
